name: gepper
description: My cpp helper commands and snippets

cpp.gepper.classPath.description: Where the class will be created

cpp.gepper.headerFileTemplate.description:
Content of your created header file. 
Available commands are:
{{__CLASSNAME__}} - entered classname.
{{__CLASSNAMEUPPER__}} - entered classname in upper-case letters.
{{__CLASSNAMELOWER__}} - entered classname in lower-case letters.
{{__CLASSNAMELOWER__}} - entered classname in lower-case letters.
{{__CLASSNAMECAPI__}} - default classname with capitalized first letter.
{{__HEADERFILENAME__}} - default headerfilename as entered in the settings. 
{{__SOURCEFILENAME__}} - default sourcefilename as entered in the settings.
